## kl switch

switch to a different environment

### Synopsis

```
Switch Environment
Examples:
  # switch to a different environment
  kl switch envs

  # switch to a different environment with environment name
  kl switch envs <environment_name>
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for switch
  -h, --help   help for switch
```
